channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microsoft HoloLens 2 discontinued with no successor in sight
item.description: Microsoft was ahead of the game in the world of enterprise AR. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Microsoft’s AI Boss Wants Copilot to Bring ‘Emotional Support’ to Windows and Office
item.description: Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman is overseeing an overhaul that gives Copilot an empathetic voice, the ability to see, and more advanced reasoning sk...

item.title: Acceleron Fusion has raised $15M to take another stab at cold fusion, filing reveals
item.description: Where most startups aim to recreate the superheated, super-pressurized conditions inside of a star, Acceleron takes a different approach. © 2024 TechC...

item.title: The complete agenda for the Disrupt Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
item.description: Get ready for TechCrunch Disrupt 2024, our signature event for startups of all stages, taking place at Moscone West in San Francisco from October 28-3...

item.title: Numa raises $32M to bring AI and automation to car dealerships
item.description: Numa, a startup developing AI-powered automation tech for car dealerships, has raised fresh capital in a Series B round. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights...

item.title: Chromebooks Are Getting a New Button and Google AI Features
item.description: Google software updates are coming, plus two new laptops—including Samsung’s first Galaxy Chromebook Plus.

item.title: 30 Nintendo Switch Games for Every Kind of Player (October 2024)
item.description: From Animal Well to The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom, these are our absolute favorite escapes for the best portable console.

item.title: Ashton Kutcher, Effie Epstein, and Guy Oseary are coming to TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
item.description: Last year, Sound Ventures, the 9-year-old, Beverly Hills, California-based venture firm led by general partners Ashton Kutcher, Guy Oseary, and Effie ...

item.title: Microsoft’s Copilot AI Gets a Voice, Vision, and a ‘Hype Man’ Persona
item.description: Powered by OpenAI’s latest models, Microsoft’s Copilot assistant is becoming a lot more handy—and wants to be an “encouraging” digital coworker.

item.title: 4 Best Dehumidifiers We've Tested and Reviewed
item.description: If you care about good air, it’s time for a dehumidifier. These are the ones we recommend for everything from basements to drying laundry.
